ModMetaData.name: The Drow Race Facial Stuff Patch
ModMetaData.author: Otto
ModMetaData.description:
[h1] This is the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=818322128] Facial Stuff[/url] patch for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1576667416] The Drow Race.[/url][/h1]
[h1] Requires [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1551109143]AlienFaces [/url] to function in addition to both of the above. [/h1]
